manzils.text: Qasam hai saf bandhney walay (farishton ki)
Phir poori tarah dantney walon ki
Phir zikar-e-Allah ki tilawat kerney walon ki
Yaqeenan tum sab ka mabood aik hi hai
Aasmano aur zamin aur inn kay darmiyan ki tamam cheezon aur mashriqon ka rab wohi hai
Hum ney aasman-e-duniya ko sitaron ki zeenat say aaraasta kiya
Aur hifazat ki sirkash shetan say
Aalam-e-bala kay farishton (ki baaton) ko sunnay kay liye woh kaan bhi nahi laga saktay bulkay her taraf say woh maaray jatay hain
Bhaganey kay liye aur unn kay liye daeemi azab hai
Magar jo koi aik aadh baat uchak lay bhagay to (foran hi) uss kay peechay dehakta hua shola lag jata hai
Inn kafiron say poocho to kay aaya inn ka peda kerna ziyadah dushwaar hai ya (unn ka) jinhen hum ney (inn kay ilawa) peda kiya? Hum ney (insano) ko less daar mitti say peda kiya hai
Bulkay tu tajjub ker raha hai aur yeh maskhara pan ker rahey hain
Aur jab enhen naseehat ki jati hai yeh nahi mantay
Aur jab kissi moajzzay ko dekhtay hain to mazaq uratay hain
Aur kehtay hain kay yeh to bilkul khullam khulla jadoo hi hai
Kiya jab hum mar jayen gay aur khak aur haddi hojayen gay phir kiya (sach much) hum uthaye jayen gay
Kiya hum say pehlay kay humaray baap dada bhi
Aap jawab dijiye! Kay haan haan aur tum zaleel (bhi) howo gay
Woh to sirf aik zor ki jhirki hai kay yakayak yeh dekhney lagay gay
Aur kahen gay kay haye humari kharabi yehi jaza (saza) ka din hai
Yehi faislay ka din hai jissay tum jhutlatay rahey
Zalimon ko aur unn kay humrahiyon ko aur (jin) jin ki woh Allah kay ilawa parastish kertay thay
(inn sab ko) jama kerkay enhen dozakh ki raah dikha do
Aur enhen theraklo (iss liye) kay inn say (zaroori) sawal kiyey janay walay hain
Tumhen kiya hogaya hai kay (iss waqt) tum aik doosray ki madad nahi kertay
Bulkay woh (sab kay sab) aaj farmanbardaar bann gaye
Woh aik doosray ki taraf mutawajja hoker sawal-o-jawab kerney lagen gay
Kahen gay kay tum to humaray pass humari dayen taraf say aatay thay
Woh jawab den gay kay nahi bulkay tum hi eman daar na thay
Aur kuch humara zor to tum per tha (hi) nahi. Bulkay tum (khud) sirkash log thay
Abb to hum (sab) per humaray rab ki yeh baat sabit ho chuki kay hum (azab) chakhney walay hain
Pus hum ney tumhen gumrah kiya hum to khud bhi gumrah hi thay
So abb aaj kay din to (sab kay sab) azab mein shareek hain
Hum gunehgaaro kay sath issi tarah kiya kertay hain
Yeh woh (log) hain kay jab inn say kaha jata hai kay Allah kay siwa koi mabood nahi to yeh sirkashi kertay thay
Aur kehtay thay kay kiya hum apnay maboodon ko aik deewaney shaeer ki baat per chor den
(nahi nahi) bulkay (nabi) to haq (sacha deen) laye hain aur sab rasoolon ko sach jantay hain
Yaqeenan tum dard-naak azab (ka maza) chakhney walay ho
Tumhen ussi ka badla diya jayega jo tum kertay thay
Magar Allah Taalaa kay khalis bargazeedah banday
Unhin kay liye muqarrara rozi hai
(her tarah kay) meway aur ba-izzat-o-ikraam hongay
Nematon wali jannaton mein
Takhton per aik doosray kay samney (bethay) hongay
Jaari sharab kay jaam ka unn per dor chal raha hoga
Jo saaf shaffaf peenay mein lazeez hogi
Na uss say dard-e-sir ho aur na uss kay peenay say behken
Aur unn kay pass neechi nazron bari bari aankhon wali (hooren) hongi
Aisi jesay chupaye huyey anday
(jannati) aik doosray ki taraf rukh kerkay poochen gay
Unn mein say aik kehney wala kahe ga mera aik sathi tha
Jo (mujh say) kaha kerta tha kay kiya tu (qayamat kay aaney ka) yaqeen kerney walon mein say hai
Kiya jab kay hum mar ker mitti aur haddi hojayen gay kiya uss waqt hum jaza diyey janey walay hain
Kahey ga tum chahtay ho kay jhaank ker dekh lo
Jhaanktay hi ussay beechon beech jahannum mein (jalta hua) dekhay ga
Kahey ga Wallah! Qareeb tha kay tu mujhay (bhi) barbaad ker day
Agar meray rab ka ehsan na hota to mein bhi dizakh mein hazir kiyey janey walon mein hota
Kiya (yeh sahih hai) kay hum marney walay hi nahi
Ba-juz pehli aik mot kay aur na hum azab kiyey janey walay hain
Phir to (zahir baat hai kay) yeh bari kaamyabi hai
Aisi (kaamyabi) kay liye amal kernay walon ko amal kerna chahayey
Kiya yeh mehmaani achi hai ya seendh (zaqoom) ka darakht
Jissay hum ney zalimon kay liye sakht aazmaeesh bana rakha hai
Be-shak woh darakht jahannum ki jarr mein say nikalta hai
Jiss kay khoshay shetan kay siron jesay hotay hain
(jahannumi) issi darakht mein say khayen gay aur issi say pet bharen gay
Phir iss per garum jaltay jaltay paani ki malooni hogi
Phir inn sab ka lotna jahannum ki (aag kay dher ki) taraf hoga
Yaqeen mano! Kay enhon ney apnay baap dadon ko behka hua paya
Aur yeh unhi kay naqsh-e-qadam per dortay rahey
Inn say pehlay bhi boht say aglay behak chukay hain
Jinn mein hum ney daraney walay (rasool) bhejay thay
Abb tu dekh ley jinhen dhamkaya gaya tha unn ka anjam kaisa kuch hua
Siwaye Allah kay bargazeedah bandon kay
Aur humen nooh (alh-e-salam) ney pukara to (dekhlo) hum kaisay achay dua qabool kerney walay hain
Hum ney ussay aur uss kay ghar walon ko uss zabardast museebat say bacha liya
Aur uss ki aulad ko hum ney baqi rehney wali bana di
Aur hum ney uss ka (zikar-e-khair) pichlon mein baqi rakha
Nooh (alh-e-salam) per tamam jahano mein salam ho
Hum neki kerney walon ko issi tarah badlay detay hain
Woh humaray eman daar bandon mein say tha
Phir hum ney doosron ko dobo diya
Aur uss (nooh alh-e-salam ki) tabeydaari kerney walon mein say (hi) ibrahim (alh-e-salam bhi) thay
Jabkay apany rab kay pass bey-aib dil laye
Unhon ney apnay baap aur apni qom say kaha kay tum kiya pooj rahey ho
Kiya tum Allah kay siwa gharay huyey maboob chahtay ho
To yeh (batlao kay) tum ney rab-ul-aalameen ko kiya samjh rakha hai
Abb ibrahim (alh-e-salam) ney aik nigah sitaron ki taraf uthaee
Aur kaha mein to beemar hun
Iss per woh sab uss say mun moray huyey wapis chalay gaye
Aap (chup chupatay) unn kay maboodon kay pass gaye aur farmaney lagay tum khatay kiyon nahi
Tumhen kiya hogaya kay baat tak nahi kertay
Phir to (poori qooat kay sath) dayen hath say unhen maarney per pal paray
Woh (butt parast) doray bhagay aap ki taraf mutawajja huyey
To aap ney farmaya tum enhen poojtay ho jinhen (khud) tum tarashtay ho
Halankay tumhen aur tumhari banaee hui cheezon ko Allah hi ney peda kiya hai
Woh kehney lagay iss kay liye aik makan banao aur iss (dekakti hui) aag mein issay daal do
Unhon ney to iss (ibrahim alh-e-salam) kay sath makar kerna chaha lekin hum ney unhi ko neecha ker diya
Aur uss (ibrahim alh-e-salam) ney kaha mein to hijrat kerkay apnay perwerdigar ki taraf janey wala hun. Woh zaroor meri rehnumaee keray ga
Aey meray rab! Mujhay nek bakht aulad ata farma
To hum ney ussay aik burd-baar bachay ki bisharat di

Phir jab woh (bacha) itni umar ko phoncha kay uss kay sath chalay phiray to uss (ibrahim alh-e-salam) ney kaha meray piyaray bachay! Mein khuwab mein apnay aap ko tujhay zibah kertay huyey dekh raha hun. Abb tu bata kay teri kiya raye hai? Betay ney jawab diya kay abba! Jo hukum hua hai ussay baja layiye inshaAllah aap mujhay sabar kerney walon mein say payen gay
Gharz jab dono mutee hogaye aur uss ney (baap ney) uss ko (betay ko) paishaani kay bal gira diya
To hum ney aawaz di kay aey ibrahim
Yaqeenan tu ney apna khuwab sacha ker dikhaya be-shak hum neki kerney walon ko issi tarah jaza detay hain
Dar-haqeeqat yeh khulla imtehan tha
Aur hum ney aik bara zabeeha iss kay fidyey mein dey diya
Aur hum ney unn ka zikar-e-khair pichlon mein baqi rakha
Ibrahim (alh-e-salam) per salam ho
Hum neko karon ko issi tarah badla detay hain
Be-shak woh humaray eman daar bandon mein say tha
Aur hum ney uss ko ishaq (alh-e-salam) nabi ki bisharat di jo saleh logon mein say hoga
Aur hum ney ibrahim-o-ishaq (al-e-heem-us-salam) per barkaten nazil farmaeen aur inn dono ki aulad mein baazay to nek bakht hain aur baaz apnay nafs per sareeh zulm kerney walay hain
Yaqeenan hum ney musa aur haroon (al-e-heem-us-salam) per bara ehsan kiya
Aur unhen aur unn ki qom ko baray dukh dard say nijat dey di
Aur unn ki madad ki to wohi ghalib rahey
Aur hum ney unhen (wazeh aur) roshan kitab di
Aur unhen seedhay rastay per qaeem rakha
Aur hum ney unn dono kay liye peechay aanay walon mein yeh baat baqi rakhi
Kay musa aur haroon (al-e-heem-us-salam) per salam ho
Be-shak hum nek logon ko issi tarah badlay diya kertay hain
Yaqeenan yeh dono humaray momin bandon mein say thay
Be-shak ilyas (alh-e-salam) bhi payghumbaron mein say thay
Jabkay unhon ney apni qom say farmaya kay tum Allah say dartay nahi ho
Kiya tum baâ€™al (naami butt) ko pukartay ho? Aur sabb say behtar khaliq ko chor detay ho
Allah jo tumhara aur tumharay aglay tamam baap dadon ka rab hai
Lekin qom ney unhen jhutlaya pus woh zaroor (azab mein) hazir rakhay jayen gay
Siwaye Allah Taalaa kay mukhlis bandon kay
Hum ney (ilyas alh-e-salam) ka zikar-e-khair pichlon mein bhi baqi rakha
Kay ilyas per salam ho
Hum neki kerney walon ko issi tarah badla detay hain
Be-shak woh humaray eman daar bandon mein say tha
Be-shak loot (alh-e-salam bhi) payghumbaron mein say thay
Hum ney unhen aur unn kay ghar walon sab ko nijat di
Ba-juz uss burhiya kay jo peechay reh janey walon mein reh gaee
Phir hum ney auron ko halak ker diya
Aur tum to subha honey per unn ki bastiyon kay pass say guzartay ho
Aur raat ko bhi kiya phir bhi nahi samajhtay
Aur bila-shuba younus (alh-e-salam) nabiyon mein say thay
Jab bhag ker phonchay bhari kashti per
Phir qura-andazi hui to maghloob hogaye
To phir unhen machli ney nigal liya aur woh khud apnay aap ko malamat kerney lag gaye
Pus agar yeh paki biyan kerney walon mein say na hotay
To logon kay uthaye janey kay din tak uss kay pet mein hi rehtay
Pus unhen hum ney chatyal medan mein daal diya aur woh uss waqt beemar thay
Aur unn per saya kerney wala aik bel daar darakht hum ney uga diya
Aur hum ney unhen aik lakh bulkay aur ziyadah aadmiyon ki taraf bheja
Pus woh eman laye aur hum ney unhen aik zamaney tak aish-o-ishrat di
Inn say daryaft kijiye! Kay kiya aap kay rab ki to betiyan hain aur inn kay betay hain
Ya yeh uss waqt mojood thay jabkay hum ney farishton ko moanniss peda kiya
Aagah raho! Kay yeh log sirf apni iftra per-dazi say keh rahey hain
Kay Allah Taalaa ki aulad hai. Yeqeenan yeh mehaz jhootay hain
Kiya Allah Taalaa ney apnay liye betiyon ko beton per tarjeeh di
Tumhen kiya hogaya hai kaisay hukum lagatay phirtay ho
Kiya tum iss qadar bhi nahi samajhtay
Ya tumharay pass iss ki koi saaf daleel hai
To jao agar sachay ho to apni hi kitab ley aao
Aur inn logon ney to Allah kay aur jinnaat kay darmiyan bhi qarabat daari theraee hai aur halankay khud jinnaat ko maloom hai kay woh (iss aqeeday kay log azab kay samney) paish kiyey jayen gay
Jo kuch yeh (Allah kay baray mein) biyan ker rahey hain uss say Allah Taalaa bilkul pak hai
Siwaye Allah kay mukhlis bandon kay
Yaqeen mano kay tum sab aur tumharay maboodaan (baatil)
Kissi aik ko bhi behka nahi saktay
Ba-juz uss kay jo jahannumi hi hai
(farishton ka qol hai kay) hum mein say to her aik ki jagah muqarrar hai
Aur hum to (bandag-e-elahee mein) saff basta kharay hain
Aur uss ki tasbeeh biyan ker rahey hain
Kuffaar to kaha kertay thay
Kay agar humaray samney aglay logon ka zikar hota
To hum bhi Allah kay cheedah banday bann jatay
Lekin phir iss quran kay sath kufur ker gaye pus abb un-qareeb jaan len gay
Aur albata humara wada pehlay hi apnay rasoolon kay liye sadir ho chuka hai
Kay yaqeenan woh hi madad kiyey jayen gay
Aur humara hi lashkar ghalib (aur bartar) rahey ga
Abb aap kuch dino tak inn say mun pher lijiyey
Aur enhen dekhtay rahiyey aur yeh bhi aagay chal ker dekh len gay
Kiya yeh humaray azab ki jaldi macha rahey hain
Suno! Jab humara azab inn kay medan mein utar aaye ga uss waqt unn ki jin ko muta-nabbay ker diya gaya tha bari buri subha hogi
Aap kuch waqt tak inn ka khayal chor dijiyey
Aur dekhtay rahiyey yeh bhi abhi abhi dekh len gay
Pak hai aap ka rab jo bot bari izzat wala hai her uss cheez say (jo mushrik) biyan kertay hain
Payghumbaron per salam hai
Aur sab tarah ki tareef Allah kay liye hai jo saray jahan ka rab hai
Suaad! Iss naseehat walay quran ki qasam
Bulkay kufaar ghooroor-o-mukhalifat mein paray huyey hain
Hum ney iss say pehlay bhi boht si ummaton ko tabah ker dala unhon ney her chand cheek pukaar ki lekin woh waqt chutkaray ka na tha
Aur kafiron ko iss baat per tajjub hua kay unhi mein say aik unhen daraney wala aagaya aur kehney lagay kay yeh to jadoogar aur jhoota hai
Kiya iss ney itnay saray maboodon ka aik hi mabood ker diya waqaee yeh boht hi ajeeb baat hai
Unn kay sardaar yeh kehtay huyey chalay kay chalo ji aur apnay maboodon per jamay raho yaqeenan iss baat mein to koi gharz hai
Hum ney to yeh baat pichlay deen mein bhi nahi suni kuch nahi yeh to sirf gharant hai
Kiya hum sab mein issi per kalam-e-elahee nazil kiya gaya hai?Dar-asal yeh log meri wahee ki taraf say shak mein hain bulkay (sahih yeh hai kay) enhon ney abb tak mera azab chakha hi nahi
Ya kiya inn kay pass teray zabardast fayyaz rab ki rehmat kay khazaney hain
Ya kiya aasman-o-zamin aur inn kay damiyan ki her cheez ki badshaat inn hi ki hai to phir yeh rasiyan taan ker charh jayen
Yeh bhi (baray baray) lashkaron mein say shikast paya hua (chota sa) lashkar hai
Inn say pehlay bhi qom-e-nooh aur aad aur meekhon walay firaon ney jhutlaya tha
Aur samood ney aur qom-e-loot ney aur aeeka kay rehney walon ney bhi yehi (baray) lashkar thay
Inn mein say aik bhi aisa na tha jiss ney rasoolon ki takzeeb na ki ho pus meri saza inn per sabit hogaee
Enhen sirf aik cheekh ka intizar hai jiss mein koi tawaquff (aur dheel) nahi hai
Aur unhon ney kaha aey humaray rab! Humari sir-nawisht tu humen roz-e-hisab say pehlay hi day dey
Aap inn ki baton per sabar keren aur humaray banday dawood (alh-e-salam) ko yaad keren jo bari qooat wala tha yaqeenan woh boht rujoo kerney wala tha
Hum ney paharon ko uss kay tabey ker rakha tha kay uss kay sath shaam ko aur subha tasbeeh khuwani keren
Aur parindon ko bhi jama hoker sab kay sab uss kay zair-e-farman rehtay
Aur hum ney uss ki saltanat ko mazboot ker diya tha aur ussay hikmat di thi aur baat ka faisla kerna
Aur kiya tujhay jhagra kerney walon ki (bhi) khabar mili? Jab kay woh deewar phaand ker mehrab mein aagaye

Jab yeh (hazrat) dawood (alh-e-salam) kay pass phonchay pus yeh unn say darr gaye unhon ney kaha khof na kijiyey! Hum do fareeq muqadma hain hum mein say aik ney ziyadti ki hai pus humaray darmiyan haq kay sath faisla ker dijiyey aur na-insafi na kijiyey aur humen seedhi raah bata dijiyey

(suniyey) yeh mera bhai hai iss kay pass ninnanway dunbiyan hain aur meray pass aik hi dunbi hai lekin yeh mujh say keh raha hai kay apni yeh aik bhi mujh hi ko day dey aur mujh per baat mein bari sakhti baratta hai

Aap ney farmaya! Iss ka apni dunbiyon kay sath teri aik dunbi mila lenay ka sawal be-shak teray upper aik zulm hai aur aksar hissay daar aur shareek (aisay hi hotay hain kay) aik doosray per zulm kertay hain siwaye unn kay jo eman laye aur jinhon ney nek amal kiyey aur aisay log boht hi kum hain aur (hazrat) dawwod (alh-e-salam) samajh gaye kay hum ney unhen aazmaya hai phir to apnay rab say istaghfaar kerney lagay aur aajzi kertay huyey gir paray aur (poori tarah) rujoo kiya
Pus hum ney bhi unn ka woh (kasoor) maaf ker diya yaqeenan woh humaray nazdeek baray martabay walay aur boht achay thikaney walay hain

Aey dawood! Hum ney tumhen zamin mein khalifa bana diya tum logon kay darmiyan haq kay sath faislay kero aur apni nafsani khuwaish ki perwi na kero werna woh tumhen Allah ki raah say bhatka deygi yaqeenan jo log Allah ki raah say bhatak jatay hain unn kay liye sakht azab hai iss liye kay unhon ney hisab kay din ko bhula diya hai
Aur hum ney aasman-o-zamin aur inn kay darmiyan ki cheezon ko na-haq peda nahi kiya yeh guman to kafiron ka hai so kafiron kay liye kharabi hai aag ki
Kiya hum unn logon ko jo eman laye aur nek amal kiye unn kay barabar ker den gay jo (humesha) zamin mein fasad machatay rahey ya perhezgaron ko badkaron jesa ker den gay
Yeh ba-barkat kitab hai jissay hum ney aap ki taraf iss liye nazil farmaya hai kay log iss ki aayaton per ghor keren aur aqalmand iss say naseehat hasil keren
Aur hum ney dawwod ko suleman (naami farzand) ata farmaya jo bara acha bandah tha aur beyhad rujoo kerney wala tha
Jab unkay samney shaam kay waqt tez-ro khasay ghoray paish kiye gaye
To kehney lagay mein ney apnay perwerdigar ki yaad per inn ghoron ki mohabbat ko tarjeeh di yahan tak kay (aftab) chup gaya
Unn (ghoron) ko doobara meray samney lao! Phir to pindliyon aur gardano per hath pherna shoroo ker diya
Aur hum ney suleman (alh-e-salam) ki aazmaeesh ki aur unn kay takhat per aik jism daal diya phir uss ney rujoo kiya
Kaha kay aey meray rab! Mujhay bakhsh day aur mujhay aisa mulk ata farma jo meray siwa kissi (shaks) kay laeeq na ho tu bara hi denay wala hai
Pus hum ney hawa ko unn kay ma-tehat ker diya woh aap kay hukum say jahan aap chahtay narmi say phoncha diya kerti thi
Aur (taqatwar) jinnat ko bhi (unn ka ma-tehat ker diya) her imarat bananey walay ko aur ghota khor ko
Aur doosray jinnat ko bhi jo zanjeeron mein jakray rehtay
Yeh hai humara atiya abb tu ehsan ker ya rol rakh kuch hisab nahi
Unn kay liye humaray pass bara taqarrub hai aur boht acha thikana hai
Aur humaray banday ayub (alh-e-salam) ka (bhi) zikar ker jabkay uss ney apnay rab ko pukara kay mujhay shetan ney ranj aur dukh phonchaya hai
Apna paaon maaro yeh nahaney ka thanda aur peenay ka paani hai
Aur hum ney ussay uss ka poora kunba ata farmaya bulkay utna hi aur bhi issi kay sath apni (khaas) rehmat say aur aqalmandon ki naseehat kay liye

Aur apnay hath mein tinko ka aik mutha (jhaaro) ley ker maar day aur qasam ka khilaf na ker sach to yeh hai kay hum ney ussay bara sabir banda paya woh bara nek banda tha aur bari hi raghbat rakhney wala
Humaray bandon ibarhim, ishaq aur yaqoob (al-e-heem-us-salam) ka bhi zikar kero jo hathon aur aankhon walay thay
Hum ney unhen aik khaas baat yani aakhirat ki yaad kay sath makhsoos ker diya tha
Yeh sab humaray nazdeek bargazeedah aur behtareen log thay
Ismail, yasa aur zulkifil (al-e-heem-us-salam) ka bhi zikar ker dijiye. Yeh sab behtareen log thay
Yeh naseehat hai aur yaqeen mano kay perhezgaron ki bari achi jagah hai
(yani hameshgi wali) jannaten jin kay darwazay unn kay liye khilay huyey hain
Jin mein ba-faraghat takkiyey lagaye bethay huyey tarah tarah kay meway aur qisam qisam ki sharabon ki farmaeesh ker rahey hain
Aur unn kay pass neechi nazron wali hum umar hooren hongi
Yeh hai jiss ka wada tum say hisab kay din kay liye kiya jata tha
Be-shak roziyan (khaas) humara atiya hain jin ka kabhi khatma hi nahi
Yeh to hui jaza (yad rakho kay) sirkashon kay liye bari buri jagah hai
Dozakh hai jiss mein woh jayen gay (aah) kiya hi bura bichona hai
Yeh hai pus issay chakhen garum paani aur peep
Iss kay ilawa aur tarah tarah kay azab
Yeh aik qom hai jo tumharay sath (aag mein) janey wali hai koi khush aamdeed unn kay liye nahi hai yehi to jahannum mein janey walay hain
Woh kahen gay bulkay tum hi ho jin kay liye koi khush amdeed nahi hai tum hi ney to issay pehlay hi say humaray samney laa rakha tha pus rehney ki bari buri jagah hai
Woh kahen gay aey humaray rab! Jiss ney (kufur ki rasam) humaray liye pehlay say nikali ho uss kay haq mein jahannum ki dugni saza kerday
Aur jahannumi kahen gay kiya baat hai kay woh log humen dikhaee nahi detay jinhen hum buray logon mein shumar kertay thay
Kiya hum ney hi unn ka mazaq bana rakha tha ya humari nigahen unn say hat gaee hain
Yaqeen jano kay dozakhiyon ka yeh jhagra zaroor hi hoga
Keh dijiye! Kay mein to sirf khabaar kerney wala hun aur ba-juz Allah wahid ghalib kay aur koi laeeq ibadat nahi
Jo perwerdigar hai aasmano ka aur zamin ka aur jo kuch inn kay darmiyan hai woh zabardast aur bara bakhsney wala hai
Aap keh dijiye kay yeh boht bari khabar hai
Jiss say tum be-parwah ho rahey ho
Mujhay unn buland qadar farishton ki (baat cheet ka) koi ilm hi nahi jabkay woh takraar ker rahey thay
Meri taraf faqat yehi wahee ki jati hai kay mein to saaf saaf aagah ker denay wala hun
Jabkay aap kay rab ney farishton say irshad farmaya kay mein mitti say insan ko peda kerney wala hun
So jab mein ussay theek thaak kerlon aur uss mein apni rooh phoonk don to tum sab uss kay samney sajjday mein gir parna
Chunacha tamam farishton ney sajjdah kiya
Magar iblees ney (na kiya) uss ney takabbur kiya aur woh tha kafiron mein say

(Allah Taalaa ney) farmaya aey iblees! Tujhay issay sajjdah kerney say kiss cheez ney roka jissay mein ney apnay hathon say peda kiya kiya tu kuch ghamand mein aagaya hai? Ya tu baray darjay walon mein say hai
Uss ney jawab diya mein iss say behtar hun tu ney mujhay aag say banaya aur iss mitti say banaya hai
Irshad hua kay tu yahan say nikal ja tu mardood hua
Aur tujh per qayamat kay din tak meri lanat-o-phitkaar hai
Kehney laga meray rab mujhay logon kay uth kharay honey kay din tak mohlat day
(Allah Taalaa ney) farmaya tu mohlat walon mein say hai
Mutayyen waqt kay din tak
Kehney laga phir to teri izzat ki qasam! Mein inn sab ko yaqeenan behka doon ga
Ba-juz teray unn bandon kay jo cheedah aur pasndeedah hon
Farmaya sach to yeh hai aur mein sach hi kaha kerta hun
Kay tujh say aur teray tamam mannay walon say mein (bhi) jahannum ko bhar doon ga
Keh dijiye! Kay mein tum say iss per koi badla talab nahi kerta aur na mein takaluf kerney walon mein say hun
Yeh to tamam jahan walon kay liye sarasir naseehat (o-ibrat) hai
Yaqeenan tum iss ki haqeeqat ko kuch hi waqt kay baad (sahih tor per) jaan logay
Iss kitab ka utaarna Allah Taalaa ghalib ba-hikmat ki taraf say hai
Yaqeenan hum ney iss kitab ko aap ki taraf haq kay sath nazil farmaya hai pus aap Allah hi ki ibadat keren ussi kay liye deen ko khalis kerti huyey

Khabradaar! Allah Taalaa hi kay liye khalis ibadat kerna hai aur jin logon ney uss kay siwa auliya bana rakhay hain (aur kehtay hain) kay hum inn ki ibadat sirf iss liye kertay hain kay yeh (buzurg) Allah kay nazdeeki kay martabay tak humari rasaee kera den yeh log jiss baray mein ikhtilaf ker rahey hain iss ka (sacha) faisla Allah (khud) keray ga. Jhootay aur na-shukray (logon) ko Allah Taalaa raah nahi dikhata
Agar Allah Taalaa ka iradah aulad hi ka hota to apni makhlooq mein say jissay chahata chun leta. (lekin) woh to pak hai wo wohi Allah Taalaa hai yagana aur qooat wala

Nihayat achi tadbeer say uss ney aasmano aur zamin ko banaya woh raat ko din per aur din ko raat per lapet deta hai aur uss ney sooraj chaand ko kaam per laga rakha hai. Her aik muqarrara muddat tak chal raha hai yaqeen mano kay wohi zabardast aur gunahon ka bakhshney wala hai

Uss ney tum sab ko aik hi jaan say peda kiya hai phir ussi say uss ka jora peda kiya aur tumharay liye chopayon mein say (aath nar-o-madah)utaray woh tumhen tumhari maaon kay peton mein aik banawat kay baad doosri banawat per banata hai teen teen andheron mein yehi Allah Taalaa tumhara rab hai ussi kay liye badshahaat hai uss kay siwa koi mabood nahi phir tum kahan behak rahey ho

Agar tum na-shukri kero to (yaad rakho kay) Allah Taalaa tum (sab say) be-niyaz hai aur woh apnay bando ki na-shukri say khush nahi aur agar tum shukar kero to woh issay tumharay liye pasand keray ga aur koi kissi ka bojh nahi uthata phit tum sab ka lotna tumharay rab hi ki taraf hai. Tumhen woh batla dey ga jo tum kertay thay. Yaqeenan woh dilon tak ki baaton ka waqif hai

Aur insan ko jab kabhi koi takleef phonchti hai to woh khoob rujoo hoker apnay rab ko pukarta hai phir jab Allah Taalaa ussay apnay pass say nemat ata farma deta hai to woh iss say pehlay jo dua kerta tha (ussay) bhool jata hai aur Allah Taalaa kay shareek muqarrar kerney lagta hai jiss say (auron ko bhi) uss ki raah say behkaye aap keh dijiye! Kay apnay kufur ka faeedah kuch din aur utha lo (aakhir) tu dozakhiyon mein honey wala hai

Bhala jo shaks raaton kay auqaat sajjday aur qayaam ki halat mein (ibadat mein) guzaarta ho aakhirat say darta ho aur apnay rab ki rehmat ki umeed rakhta ho(aur jo iss kay bar-aks ho barbar ho saktay hain) batao to ilm walay aur be-ilm kiya barabar kay hain? Yaqeenan naseehat wohi hasil kertay hain jo aqalmand hon. (apnay rab ki taraf say)

Kehdo kay aey meray eman walay bando! Apnay rab say dartay raho jo iss duniya mein neki kertay hain unn kay liye nek badla hai aur Allah Taalaa ki zamin boht kushadah hai sabar kerney walon hi ko unn ka poora poora be-shumaar ajar diya jata hai
Aap keh dijiye! Kay mujhay hukum diya gaya hai kay Allah Taalaa ki iss tarah ibadat keroon kay ussi kay liye ibadat ko khalis ker loon
Aur mujhay hukum diya gaya hai kay mein sab say pehla farmabardaar ban jaon
Keh dijiyey! Kay mujhay to apnay rab ki na-farmani kertay huyey baray din kay azab ka khof aata lagta hai
Keh dijiyey! Kay mein to khalis ker kay sirf apnay rab hi ki ibadat kerta hun

Tum uss kay siwa jiss ki chahao ibadat kertay raho keh dijiyey! Kay haqeeqi ziyan kaar woh hain jo apnay aap ko aur apnay ehal ko qayamat kay din nuksan mein daal den gay yad rekho kay khullam khulla nuksan yehi hai
Unehn neechay uper say aag kay (sholay misil)sayebaan (kay)dhaank rahey hongay. Yehi (azab) hai jin say Allah Taalaa apnay bando ko dara raha hai aey meray bando! Pus mujh say dartay raho
Aur jin logon ney taghoot ki ibadat say perhez kiya aur (hama-tan) Allah Taalaa ki taraf mutawajja rahey woh khushkhabri kay mustahiq hain meray bando ko khushkhabri suna dijiyey
Jo baat ko kaan laga ker suntay hain. Phir jo behtareen baat ho uss ki ittbaa kertay hain. Yehi hain jinhen Allah Taalaa ney hidayat ki hai aur yehi aqalmand bhi hain
Bhala jiss shaks per azab ki baat saabit ho chuki hai to kiya aap ussay jo dozakh mein hai chura saktay hain

Haan woh log jo apnay rab say dartay rahey unn kay liye bala khaney hain jinkay uper bhi banay banaye bala khaney hain (aur) unn kay neechay nehren beh rahi hain. Rab ka wada hai aur woh wada khilafi nahi kerta

Kiya aap ney nahi dekha kay Allah Taalaa aasman say paani utaarta hai aur ussay zamin ki sooton mein phonchata hai phir issi kay zariyey mukhtalif qisam ki khetiyan ugata hai phit woh khushk hojati hain aur aap unhen zard rang dekhtay hain phir unhen reza reza ker deta hai iss mein aqalmando kay liye boht ziyadah naseehat hai

Kiya woh shaks jiss ka seena Allah Taalaa ney islam kay liye khol diya hai pus woh apnay perwerdigar ki taraf say aik noor per hai aur halaki hai unn per jin kay dil yaad-e-elahi say (asar nahi letay bulkay) sakht hogaye hain. Yeh log sareeh gumrahi mein (mubtila) hain

Allah Taalaa ney behtareen kalam nazil farmaya hai jo aisi kitab hai kay aapas mein milti julti aur baar baar dohraee hui aayaton ki hai jiss say unn logon kay rongtay kharay hojatay hain jo apnay rab ka khof rakhtay hain aakhir mein unn kay jisam aur dil Allah Taalaa kay zikar ki taraf naram hojatay hain yeh hai Allah Taalaa ki hidayat jiss kay zariyey jissay chahaye raah-e-raast per laga deta hai. Aur jissay Allah Taalaa hi raah bhula dey uss ka koi hadi nahi
Bhala jo shaks qayamat kay din kay bad-tareen azab ki sapar (dhaal) apnay mun ko banaye ga. (aisay) zalimon say kaha jayega kay apnay kiyey ka (wabal) chakho
Inn say pehlay walon ney bhi jhutlaya phir unn per wahan say azab aa para jahan say unn ko khayal bhi na tha
Aur Allah Taalaa ney unhen zindagan-e-duniya mein ruswaee ka maza chakhaya aur abhi aakhirat ka to bara bhari azab hai kaash kay yeh log samajh len
Aur yaqeenan hum ney iss quran mein logon kay liye her qisam ki misalen biyan ker di hain kiya ajab kay woh naseehat hasil kerlen
Quran hai arabi mein jiss mein koi kuji nahi ho sakta hai kay woh perhezgari ikhtiyar ker len

Allah Taalaa misal biyan farma raha hai aik woh shaks jiss mien boht say bahum zidd rakhney walay saajhi hain aur doosra woh shaks jo sirf aik hi ka (ghulam) hai kiya yeh dono sift mein yaksan hain Allah Taalaa hi kay liye sab tareef hai. Baat yeh hai kay inn mein say aksar log samajhtay nahi
Yaqeenan khud aap ko bhi mot aayegi aur yeh sab bhi marney walay hain
Phir tum sab kay sab qayamat kay din apnay rab kay samney jhagro gay
Uss say barh ker zalim kon hai jo Allah Taalaa per jhoot bolay? Aur sacha deen jab uss kay pass aaye to ussay jhoota bataye? Kiya aisay kuffaar kay liye jahannum thikana nahi hai
Aur jo sachay deen ko laye aur jiss ney iss ki tasdeeq ki yehi log paarsa hain
Unn kay liye unn kay rab kay pass (her) woh cheez hai jo yeh chahyen nek logon ka yeh hi badla hai
Takay Allah Taalaa unn say unn kay buray amalon ko door ker dey aur jo nek kaam unhon ney kiyey hain unn ka acha badla ata farmaye
Kiya Allah Taalaa apnay bandon kay liye kafi nahi? Yeh log aap ko Allah kay siwa auron say dara rahey hain aur jissay Allah gumrah ker day uss ki rehnumaee kerney wala koi nahi
Aur jissay woh hidayat day ussay koi gumrah kerney wala nahi kiya Allah Taalaa ghalib aur badla lenay wala nahi hai

Agar aap inn say poochen kay aasman-o-zamin ko kiss ney peda kiya hai? To yaqeenan woh yehi jawab den gay kay Allah ney. Aap inn kahiyey acha yeh to batao jinhen tum Allah kay siwa pukartay ho agar Allah Taalaa mujhay nuksan phonchana chahye to kiya yeh uss kay nuksan ko hata saktay hain? Ya Allah Taalaa mujh per meharbani ka iradah keray to kiya yeh uss ki meharbani ko rok saktay hain? Aap keh den kay Allah mujhay kafi hai tawakkal kerney walay ussi per tawakkal kertay hain
Keh dijiye kay aey meri qom! Tum apni jagah per amal kiye jao mein bhi amal ker raha hun abhi abhi tum jaan lo gay
Kay kiss per ruswa kerney wala azab aata hai aur kiss per daeemi maar aur hameshgi ki saza hoti hai

Aap per hum ney haq kay sath yeh kitab logon kay liye nazil farmaee hai pus jo shaks rah-e-raast per aajaye uss kay apnay liye nafa hai aur jo gumrah hojaye uss ki gumrahee ka (wabal) ussi per hai aap unn kay zimay daar nahi

Allah hi roohon ko unn ki mot kay waqt aur jin ki mot nahi aai unhen unn ki neend kay waqt qabz ker leta hai phir jin per mot ka hukum lag chuka hai unhen to rok leta hai aur doosri (roohon) ko aik muqarrar waqt kay liye chor deta hai. Ghor kerney walon kay liye iss mein yaqeenan boht si nishaniyan hain
Kiya inn logon ney Allah Taalaa kay siwa (auron ko) sifarshi muqarrar ker rakha hai? Aap keh dijiye! Kay go woh kuch bhi ikhtiyar na raktay hon aur na aqal rakhtay hon
Keh dijiye! Kay tamam sifarish ka mukhtar Allah hi hai. Tamam aasmano aur zamin ka raaj ussi kay liye hai tum sab ussi k taraf pheray jao gay

Jabb Allah akelay ka zikar kiya jaye to inn logon kay dil nafrat kerney lagtay hain jo aakhirat ka yaqeen nahi rakhtay aur jab uss kay siwa (aur ka ) zikar kiya jaye to unn kay dil khul ker khush ho jatay hain
Aap keh dijiye! Kay aey Allah ! Aasmano aur zamin kay peda kerney walay chupay khulay ka jannay walay tu hi apnay bandon mein inn umoor ka faisla farmaye ga jin mein who ulajh rahey thay

Agar zulm kerney walon kay pass woh sab kuch ho jo ruy-e-zamin per hai aur iss kay sath utna hi aur ho to bhi bad-tareen saza kay badlay mein qayamat kay din yeh sab kuch day den aur inn kay samney Allah ki taraf say woh zahir hoga jiss ka gumaan bhi enhen na tha
Jo kuch enhon ney kiya tha uss ki buraiyan inn per khul paren gi aur jiss ka woh mazaq kertay thay woh enhen aa gheray ga

Insan ko jab koi takleef phonchti hai to humen pukarney lagta hai phir jab hum ussay apni taraf say koi nemat ata farma den to kehney lagta hai kay issay to mein mehaz apnay ilm ki waja say diya gaya hun bulkay yeh aazmaeesh hai lekin inn mein say aksar log bey-ilm hain
Inn say aglay bhi yehi baat keh chukay hain pus unn ki kaarawaee unn kay kuch kaam na aaee
Phir unn ki tamam burayian unn per aa paren aur unn mein say bhi jo gunehgaar hain unn ki ki hui burayian bhi unn per aa paren gi yeh (humen) hara denay walay nahi
Kiya enhen yeh maloom nahi kay Allah Taalaa jiss kay liye chahye rozi kushadah ker deta hai aur tang (bhi) eman laney walon kay liye iss mein (bari bari) nishaniyan hain

(meri janib say) keh do kau aey meray bando! Jinhon ney apni jano per ziyadti ki hai tum Allah ki rehmat say na-umeed na hojao bil-yaqeen Allah Taalaa saray gunahon ko bakhash deta hai waqaee woh bari bakhsish bari rehmat wala hai
Tum (sab) apnay perwerdigar ki taraf jhuk paro aur uss ki hukum bardaari kiye jao iss say qabal kay tumharay pass azab aajaye aur phir tumhari madad na ki jaye
Aur pairwee kero uss behtareen cheez ki jo tumhari taraf tumharay perwerdigar ki taraf say nazil ki gaee hai iss say pehlay kay tum per achanak azab aajaye aur tumhen itla bhi na ho
(Aisa na ho kay) koi shaks kahey haaye afsos! Iss baat per kay mein ney Allah Taalaa kay haq mein kotahee ki bulkay mein to mazaq uraney walon mein hi raha
Ya kehey kay agar Allah mujhay hidayat kerta to mein bhi paarsa logon mein hota
Ya azab ko dekh ker kahey kaash! Kay kissi tarah mera lot jana ho jata to mein bhi neko kaaro mein ho jata
Haan (haan) be-shak teray pass meri aayaten phonch chuki thin jinhen tu ney jhutlaya aur ghooroor takabbur kiya aur tu tha hi kafiron mein
Aur jin logon ney Allah per jhoot bandha hai to aap dekhen gay kay qayamat kay din unn kay chehray siyah hogaye hongay kiya takabbur kerney walon ka thikana jahannum mein nahi
Aur jin logon ney perhezgari ki unhen Allah Taalaa unn ki kamyabi kay sath bacha ley ga unhen koi dukh choo bhi na sakay ga aur na woh kissi tarah ghumgeen hongay
Allah her cheez ka peda kerney wala hai aur wohi her cheez per nigehbaan hai
Aasmano aur zamin ki kunjiyon ka malik wohi hai jin jin logon ney Allah ki aayaton ka inkar kiya wohi khasarah paney walay hain
Aap keh dijiye aey jahilo! Kiya tum mujh say Allah ka siwa auron ki ibadat ka kehtay ho

Yaqeenan teri taraf bhi aur tujh say pehlay (kay tamam nabiyon) ki taraf bhi wahee ki gaee hai kay agar tu ney shirk kiya to bila shuba tera amal zaya hojayega aur bil-yaqeen tu ziyan kaaron mein say hojayega
Bulkay tu Allah hi ki ibadat ker aur shukar kerney walon mein say hoja

Aur inn logon ney jaisi qadar Allah Taalaa ki kerni chahyey thi nahi ki sari zami qayamat kay din uss ki muthi mein hogi aur tamam aasman uss kay dahaney hath mein lapetay huyey hongay woh pak aur bartar hai her uss cheez say jissay log uss ka shareek banayen

Aur soor phoonk diya jayega pus aasmano aur zamin walay sab bey-hosh ho ker gir paren gay magar jissay Allah chahyey phit doobara soor phoonka jayega pus woh aik dum kharay hoker dekhney lag jayen gay

Aur zamin apney perwerdigar ka noor say jagmaga uthay gi naam-e-aemaal hazir kiyey jayen gay nabiyon aur gawahon ko ko laya jayega aur logon kay darmiyan haq haq faislay ker diyey jayen gay aur woh zulm na kiyey jayen gay
Aur jiss shaks ney jo kuch kiya hai bharpoor dey diya jayega jo kuch log ker rahey hain woh bakhoobi jannay wala hai

Kafiron kay ghol kay ghol jahannum ki taraf hankaye jayen gay jab woh uss kay pass phonch jayen gay uss kay darwazay unn kay liye khol diye jayen gay aur wahan kay nigehbaan unn say sawal keren gay kay kiya tumharay pass tum mein say rasool nahi aaye thay? Jo tum per tumharay rab ki aayaten parhtay thay aur tumhen uss din ki mulaqat say daratay thay? Yeh jawab den gay kay haan durust hai lekin azab ka hukum kafiron per sabit hogaya
Kaha jayega kay abb jahannum kay darwazon mein dakhil hojao jahan hamesha rahen gay pus sirkashon ka thikana boht hi bura hai

Aur jo log apnay rab say dartay thay unn kay giroh kay giroh jannat ki taraf rawana kiyey jayen gay yahan tak kay jab uss kay pass aajayen gay aur darwazay khol diyey jayen gay aur wahan kay nigehbaan unn say kahen gay tum per salam ho tum khushaal raho tum iss mein hamesha kay liye chalay jao

Yeh kahen gay kay Allah ka shukar hai jiss ney hum say apna wada poora kiya aur hamen iss zamin ka waris bana diya kay jannat mein jahan chahyen muqam ker len pus amal kerney walon ka kiya hi acha badla hai

Aur tu farishton ko Allah kay arash kay ird-gird halqa bandhay huyey apnay rab ki hamd-o-tasbeeh kerta huyey dekhay ga aur inn mein insaf ka faisla kiya jayega aur keh diya jayega kay sari khoobi Allah hi kay liye hai jo tamam jahano ka palanhaar hai
Haa-meem
Iss kitab ka nazil farmana uss Allah ki taraf say hai jo ghalib aur dana hai
Gunah ka bakhsney wala aur toba ka qabool farmaney wala sakht azab wala inam-o-qudrat wala jiss kay siwa koi mabood nahi. Ussi ki taraf wapis lotna hai
Allah Taalaa ki aayaton mein wohi log jhagartay hain jo kafir hain pus inn logon ka shehron mein chalna phirna aap ko dhokay mein na daal day

Qom-e-nooh ney aur unn kay baad kay girohon ney bhi jhutlaya tha. Aur her ummat ney apnay rasool ko giriftar kerleney ka iradah kiya aur baatil kay zariyey kaj behasiyan kien takay unn say haq ko bigar den pus mein ney unn ko pakar liya so meri taraf say kaisi saza hui
Aur issi tarah aap kay rab ka hukum kafiron per sabit hogaya kay woh dozakhi hain

Arash kay uthaney walay aur uss kay aas pass kay (farishtay) apnay rab ki tasbeeh hamd kay sath sath kertay hain aur uss per eman rakhtay hain aur eman walon kay liye istaghfaar kertay hain kehtay hain kay aey humaray perwerdigar! Tu ney her cheez ko apni bakhsish aur ilm say gher rakha hai pus tu enhen bakhash day jo toba keren aur teri raah ki perwi keren aur tu enhen dozakh kay azab say bhi bacha lay

Aey humaray rab! Tu enhen hameshgi wali jannaton mein ley ja jin kay tu ney inn say wada kiya hai aur inn kay baap dadon aur biwiyon aur aulad mein say (bhi) inn (sab) ko jo nek amal hain. Yaqeenan tu to ghalib-o-ba-hikmat hai
Enhen burayion say bhi mehfooz rakh hq to yeh hai kay uss din tu ney jissay burayion say bacha liya uss per tu ney rehmat kerdi aur boht bari kaamyabi to yehi hai

Be-shak jin logon ney kufur kiya unhen yeh awaz di jayegi kay yaqeenan Allah ka tum per gussa hona uss say boht ziyadah hai jo tum gussa hotay thay apnay ji say jab tum eman ki taraf bulaye jatay thay phir kufur kerney lagtay thay
Woh kahengay aey humaray perwerdigar! Tu ney humen doobara maara aur doobara hi jilaya abb hum apnay gunahon kay iqrari hain to kiya abb koi raah nikalney ki bhi hai

Yeh (azab) tumhen iss liye hai kay jabb sirf akelay Allah ka ziker kiya jata to tum inkar ker jatay thay aur agar iss kay sath kissi ko shareek kiya jata tha to tum maan letay thay pus abb faisal Allah buland-o-buzurg hi ka hai
Wohi hai jo tumhen apni nishaniyan dikhalata hai aur tumharay liye aasman say rozi utarta hai naseehat to sirf wohi hasil kertay hain jo (Allah ki taraf rujoo kertay hain)
Tum Allah ko pukartay raho uss kay liye deen ko khalis ker key go kafir bura manen
Buland darjon wala arash ka malik woh apnay bandon mein say jiss per chahata hai wahee nazil kerta farmata hai takay woh mulaqat kay din say daraye
Jiss din sab log zahir hojayen gay unn ki koi cheez Allah say pocheedah na rahey gi. Aaj kiss ki baadshahi hai? Faqat Allah wahid-o-qahar ki
Aaj her nafas ko uss ki kamaee ka badla diya jayega. Aaj (kissi qisam ka) zulm nahi yaqeenan Allah Taalaa boht jald hisab kerney wala hai

Aur enhen boht hi qareeb anay wali (qayamat say) aagah kerdijiye jab kay dil halaq tak phonch jayen gay aur sab khamosh hongay zalimon ka na koi dili dost hoga na sifarshi kay jiss ki baat mani jaye gi
Woh aankhon ki khayanat ko aur seenon ki posheedah baaton ko (khoob) janta hai
Aur Allah Taalaa theek theek failsa ker dey ga uss kay siwa jihen yeh log pukartay hain woh kissi cheez ka bhi faisla nahi ker saktay be-shak Allah Taalaa khoob sunta khoob dekhta hai

Kiya yeh log zamin mein chalay phiray nahi kay dekhtay kay jo log inn say pehlay thay unn ka nateeja kaisa kuch hua? Woh ab-aitbaar qooat-o-taqat kay aur ba-aitbaar zamin mein apni yaadgaron kay inn say boht ziyadah thay pus Allah ney unhen unn kay gunahon per pakar liya aur koi na hua jo unhen Allah kay azab say bacha leta
Yeh iss waja say kay unn kay pass unn kay payghumber mojzzay ley ker aatay thay to woh inkar ker detay thay pus Allah unhen pakar leta tha. Yaqeenan woh taqatwar aur sakht azab wala hai
Aur hum ney musa (alh-e-salam) ko apni aayaton aur khulli daleelon kay sath bheja
Firaon hamaan aur qaroon ki taraf to unhon ney kaha (yeh to) jaddogar aur jhoota hai

Pus jab unn kay pass (musa alh-e-salam) humari taraf say (deen) haq ko ley ker aaye to unhon ney kaha kay iss kay sath jo eman walay hain unn kay larkon ko to maar dalo aur inn ki larkiyon ko zindah rakho aur kafiron ki jo heela saazi hai woh ghalati mein hi hai

Aur firaon ney kaha mujhay choro kay mein musa (alh-e-salam) ko maar dalon aur issay chahyey kay apnay rab ko pukaray mujhay to darr hai kay yeh kahen tumhara deen na badal dalay ya mulk mein koi (boht bara) fasad barpa na ker day
Musa (alh-e-salam) ney kaha mein apnay aur tumharay rab ki panah mein aata hun her uss takabbur kerney walay shaks (ki buraee) say jo roz-e-hisab per eman nahi rakhta

Aur aik momin shaks ney ji firaon kay khandan mein say tha aur apna eman chupaye huyey tha kaha kay kiya tum aik shaks ko mehaz iss baat per qatal kertay ho kay woh kehta hai kay mera rab Allah hai aur tumharay rab ki taraf say daleelen ley ker aaya hai agar woh jhoota ho to uss ka jhoot ussi per hai aur agar woh sacha ho to jiss (azab) ka woh tum say wada ker raha hai uss mein say kuch na kuch to tum per aa paray ga Allah Taalaa uss ki rehbari nahi kerta jo hadd say guzar janey walay aur jhootay hon

Aey meri qom kay logo! Aaj to badshahaat tumhari hai kay iss zamin per tum ghalib ho lekin Allah ka azab hum per aagaya to kon humari madad keray ga? Firaon bola mein to tumhen wohi raye dey raha hun jo khud dekh raha hun aur mein to tumhen bhalaee ki raah hi batla raha hun
Uss momin ney kaha aey meri qom! (kay logo) mujhay to andesha hai kay tum per bhi wesa hi roz (bad azab) na aaye jo aur ummaton per aaya
Jesay ummat-e-nooh aur aad-o-samood aur inn kay baad walon ka (haal hua) Allah apnay bandon per kissi tarah ka zulm kerna nahi chahata
Aur mujhay tum per haank pukar kay din ka bhi darr hai
Jiss din tum peeth pher ker loto gay tumhen Allah say bachaney wala koi na hoga aur jissay Allah gumrah ker day uss ka hadi koi nahi

Aur iss say pehlay tumharay pass (hazrat) yousuf daleelen ley ker aaye phir bhi tum inn ki laaee hui (daleel) mein shak-o-shuba hi kertay rahey yahan tak kay jab unki wafaat hogaee to kehney lagay inn kay baad to Allah kissi rasool ko bhejay ga hi nahi issi tarah Allah gumrah kerta hai her uss shaks ko jo hadd say barh janey wala shak-o-shuba kerney wala ho

Jo baghair kissi sanad kay jo inn kay pass aaee ho Allah ki aayaton mein jhagartay hain Allah kay nazdeek aur momino kay nazdeek yeh to boht bari narazgi ki cheez hai Allah Taalaa issi tarah her aik maghroor sirkash kay dil per mohar ker deta hai
Firaon ney kaha aey haamaan! Meray liye aik bala khana bana shayad kay mein jo aasman kay darwazay hain

(unn) darwazon tak phonch jaon aur musa kay mabood ko jhaank loon aur be-shak mein samjhta hun woh jhoota hai aur issi tarah firaon ki bad-kirdariyan ussay bhali dikhaee gaeen aur raah say rok diya gaya aur firaon ki (her) heela saazi tabahee mein hi rahee
Aur uss momin shaks ney kaha kay aey meri qom! (kay logo) tum (sab) meri perwi kero mein nek raah ki taraf tumhari rehbari keroon ga
Aey meri qom! Yeh hayat-e-duniya matay-e-faani hai (yaqeen mano kay qarar) aur hameshgi ka ghar to aakhirat hi hai

Jiss ney gunah kiya hai ussay to barabar barabar ka badla hi hai aur jiss ney neki ki hai khua woh mard ho ya aurat aur woh eman wala ho to yeh log jannat mein jayen gay aur wahan be-shumar rozi payen gay
Aey meri qom! Yeh kiya baat hai kay mein tumhen nijat ki taraf bula raha hun aur tum mujhay dizakh ki taraf bula rahey ho

Tum mujhay yeh dawat dey rahey ho kay mein Allah kay sath kufur keroon aur uss kay sath shirk keroon jiss ka koi ilm mujhay nahi aur mein tumhen ghalib bakhshney walay (mabood) ki taraf dawat dey raha hun

Yeh yaqeeni amar hai kay tum mujhay jiss ki taraf bula rahey ho woh to na duniya mein pukaray janey kay qabil hai na aakhirat mein aur yeh (bhi yaqeeni baat hai) kay hum sab ka lotna Allah ki taraf hai aur hadd say guzar janey walay hi (yaqeenan) ahl-e-dozakh hain
Pus aagay chal ker tum meri baaton ko yaad kero gay mein apna moamla Allah kay supurd kerta hun yaqeenan Allah Taalaa bandon ka nigran hai
Pus ussay Allah Taalaa ney tamam badiyon say mehfooz rakh liya jo unhon ney soch rakhi thin aur firaon walon per buri tarah ka azab ulat para
Aag hai jiss kay samney yeh her subah shaam laye jatay hain aur jiss din qayamat qaeem hogi (farman hoga kay) firaoniyon ko sakht tareen azab mein daalo

Aur jab kay dozakh mein aik doosray say jhagren gayto kamzor log takabbur walon say (jin kay yeh tabey thay) kahen gay kay hum to tumharay pairo thay to kiya tum hum say iss aag ka koi hissa hata saktay ho
Woh baray log jawab den gay hum to sabhi iss aag mein hain Allah Taalaa apnay bandon kay darmiyan faislay ker chuka hai
Aur (tamam)jahannumi mill ker jahannum kay daroghon say kahen gay kay tum hi apnay perwerdigar say dua kero kay woh kissi din to humaray azab mein kami kerdey
Woh jawab den gay kay kiya tumharay pass tumharay rasool mojzzay ley ker nahi aaye thay? Woh kehen gay kiyon nahi woh kahen gay phir tum hi dua kero aur kafiron ki dua mehaz be-asar aur be-raah hai
Yaqeenan hum apnay rasoolon ki aur eman walon ki madad zindaganiy-e-duniya mein bhi keren gay aur uss din bhi jab gawahee denay walay kharay hongay
Jiss din zalimon ko unn ki (uzar) maazrat kuch nafa na dey gi unn kay liye laanat hi hogi aur unn kay liye bura ghar hoga
Hum ney musa (alh-e-salam) ko hidayat nama ata farmaya aur bano israeel ko iss kitab ka waris banaya
Kay woh hidayat-o-naseehat thi aqal mando kay liye
Pus aey nabi! To sabar ker Allah ka wada bila shak (o-shuba) sacha hi hai tu apnay gunah ki maafi mangta reh aur subah shaam apnay perwerdigar ki tasbeeh aur hamd biyan kerta reh

Jo log bawajood apnay pass kissi sanad kay na honay kay aayat-e-elahee mein jhagra kertay hain unn kay dilon mein ba-juz nirri baraee kay aur kuch nahi woh uss tak phonchney walay hi nahi so tu Allah ki panah mangta reh be-shak woh poora sunnay wala aur sab say ziyadah dekhney wala hai
Aasmano-o-zamin ki pedaeesh yaqeenan insan ki pedaeesh say boht bara kaam hai lekin (yeh aur baat hai kay) aksar log be-ilm hain
Andha aur beena barabar nahi na woh log jo eman laye aur bhalay kaam kiyey bad-kaaron kay (barabar hain) tum (boht) kum naseehat hasil ker rahey ho
Qayamat bil-yaqeen aur be-shuba aaney wali hai lekin (yeh aur baat hai kay) boht say log eman nahi latay

Aur tumharay rab ka farman (sirzad ho chuka) hai kay mujh say dua kero mein tumhari duaon ko qabool keroon ga yaqeen mano kay jo log meri ibadat say khudsari kertay hain woh abhi abhi zaleel hoker jahannum mein phonch jayen gay

Allah Taalaa ney tumharay liye raat bana di kay tum iss mein aaram hasil kero aur din ko dekhney wala bana diya be-shak Allah Taalaa logon per fazal-o-karam wala hai lekin aksat log shukar guzari nahi kertay
Yehi Allah hai tum sab ka rab her cheez ka khaliq iss kay siwa koi mabood nahi phir kahan tum phiray jatay ho
Issi tarah woh log bhi pheray jatay rahey jo Allah ki aayaton ka inkar kertay thay

Allah hi hai jiss ney tumharay liye zami ko therney ki jagah aur aasman ko chat bana diya aur tumhari sooraten banaeen aur boht achi banaeen aur tumehn umdah umdah cheezen khaney ko ata farmaeen yehi Allah tumhara perwerdigar hai pus boht hi barkaton wala Allah hai saray jahaan ka perwerish kerney wala
Woh zindah hai jiss kay siwa koi mabood nahi pus tum khalis ussi ki ibadat kertay huyey ussay pukaro tamam khoobiyen Allah hi kay liye hain jo tamam jahano ka rab hai

Aap keh dijiyey! Kay mujhay unn ki ibadat say rok diya gaya hai jinhen tum Allah kay siwa pukar rahey ho iss bina per kay meray pass meray rab ki daleelen phonch chuki hain mujhay yeh hukum diya gaya hai kay mein tamam jahano kay rab ka tabey farman hojaon

Woh wohi hai jiss ney tumhen mitti say phir nutfay say phir khoon kay lothray say peda kiya phir tumhen bachay ki soorat mein nikalta hai phir (tumhen barhata hai kay) tum apni qooat ko phonch jao phir boorhay hojao. Tum mein say baaz iss say pehlay hi fot hojatay hain (woh tumhen chor deta hai) takay tum muddat moayyen tak phonch jao aur takay tum soch samajh lo
Wohi hai jo jilata hai aur maar dalta hai phir woh jab kissi kaam ka kerna muqarrar kerta hai to ussay sirf yeh kehta hai kay hoja pus woh hojata hai
Kiya tu ney unhen dekha jo Allah ki aayaton mein jhagartay hain woh kahan pher diyey jatay hain
Jinn logon ney kitab ko jhutlaya aur ussay bhi jo hum ney apnay rasoolon kay sath bheja unhen abhi abhi haqeeqat-e-haal maloom hojayegi
Jabakay unki gardano mein toq hongay aur zanjeeren hongi ghaseetay jayen gay
Kholtay huyey paani mein aur phir jahannum ki aag mein jalaye jayen gay
Phir unn say poocha jayega kay jinhen tum shareek kertay thay woh kahan hain
Jo Allah kay siwa thay woh kahen gay kay woh to hum say behak gaye bulkay hum to iss say pehlay kissi ko bhi pukartay hi na thay. Allah Taalaa kafiron ko issi tarah gumrah kerta hai
Yeh badla hai uss cheez ka jo tum zamin mein na-haq phoolay na samatay thay. Aur (be-ja) itratay phirtay thay
(abb aao) jahannum mein hamesha rehney kay liye (iss kay) darwazon mein dakhil hojao kiya hi buri jagah hai takabbur kerney walon ki

Pus aap sabar keren Allah ka wada qataâ€™an sacha hai enhen hum ney jo waday dey rakhay hain inn mein say kuch hum aap ko dikhayen ya (iss say pehlay) hum aap ko wafat dey den inn ka lotaya jana to humari hi taraf hai

Yaqeenan hum aap say pehlay bhi boht say rasool bhej chukay hain jinn mein say baaz kay (waqeyaat) hum aap ko biyan ker chukay hain aur unn mein say baaz kay (qissay) to hum ney aap ko biyan hi nahi kiyey aur kissi rasool ka yeh (maqdoor) na tha kay koi mojzza Allah ki ijazat kay baghair la sakay phir jiss waqt Allah ka hukum aaye ga haq kay sath faisla ker diya jayega aur uss jagah ahl-e-baatil khasaray mein reh jayen gay
Allah woh hai jiss ney tumharay liye chopaye peda kiyey jinn mein say baaz per tum sawar hotay ho aur baaz ko tum khatay ho
Aur bhi tumharay liye inn mein boht say nafay hain aur takay apnay seeno mein chupi hui hajaton ko inhi per sawari kerkay tum hasil kerlo aur inn chopayon per aur kashtiyon per sawar kiyey jatay ho
Allah tumhen apni nishaniyan dikhata jaraha hai pus tum Allah ki kin kin nishaniyon ka munkir bantay raho gay

Kiya enhon ney zamin mein chal phir ker apnay say pehlon ka anjam nahi dekha? Jo inn say tadaad mein ziyadah thay qooat mein sakht aur zamin mein boht sari yaadgaren chori thin unn kay kiyey kaamon ney unhen kuch bhi faeedah na phonchaya
Pus jab kabhi unn kay pass unn kay rasool khulli nishaniyan ley ker aaye to yeh apnay pass kay ilm per itraney lagay bil-aakhir jiss cheez ko mazaq mein ura rahey thay wohi unn per ulat pari
Humara azab dekhtay hi kehney lagay kay Allah wahid per hum eman laye aur jin jin ko hum uss ka shareek bana rahey thay hum ney unn sab say inkar kiya

Lekin humaray azab ko dekh lenay kay baad unn kay eman ney unhen nafa na diya. Allah ney apna mamool yehi muqarrar ker rakha hai jo uss kay bando mein barabar chala aaraha hai aur uss jagah kafir kharab-o-khasta huyey
Haa-meem
Utari hui hai baray meharban boht reham walay ki taraf say
(Aisi) kitab hai jiss ki aayaton ki wazeh tafseel ki gaee hai (iss haal mein kay) quran arabi zaban mein hai uss qom kay liye jo janti hai
Khuskhabri sunanay wala aur daraney wala hai phir bhi inn ki aksariyat ney mun pher liya aur woh suntay hi nahi

Aur enhon ney kaha kay tu jiss ki taraf humen bula raha hai humaray dil to iss say parday mein hain aur humaray kaano mein giraani hai aur hum mein aur tujh mein aik hijab hai acha tu abb apna kaam kiyey ja hum bhi yaqeenan kaam kerney walay hain

Aap keh dijiyey! Kay mein to tum hi jaisa insan hun mujh per wahee nazil ki jati hai kay tum sab ka mabood aik Allah hi hai so tum uss ki taraf mutawajja hojaoaur uss say gunhaon ki maafi chahao aur inn mushrikon kay liye (bari hi) kharabi hai
Jo zakat nahi detay aur aakhirat kay bhi munkir hi rehtay hain
Be-shak jo log eman layen aur bhalay kaam keren unn kay liye na khatam honey wala ajar hai
Aap keh dijiye! Kay kiya tum uss (Allah) ka inkar kertay ho aur tum uss kay shareek muqarrar kertay ho jiss ney do din mein zamin peda kerdi saray jahano ka perwardigar wohi hai

Aur uss ney zamin mein aur uss kay uper say pahaar gaar diyey aur iss mein barkat rakh di aur iss mein (rehney walon ki) ghizaon ki tajweez bhi issi mein kerdi (sirf) char din mein zaroorat mandon kay liye yaksan tor per
Phir aasman ki taraf mutawajja hua aur woh dhuwan (sa) tha pus issay aur zamin say farmaya kay tum khushi say aao ya na khushi say. Donon ney araz kiya hum ba-khushi hazir hain

Pus do din mein saat aasman bana diyey aur her aasman mein iss kay munasib ehkaam ki wahee bhej di aur hum ney aasman-e-duniya ko charaghon say zeenat di aur nigheybaani ki yeh tadbeer Allah ghalib-o-dana ki hai
Abb bhi yeh roo-gardan ho to keh dijiyey! Kay mein tumhen uss karak (azab-e-aasmani) say darata hun jo misil aadiyon aur samoodiyon ki karak kay hogi

Unn kay pass jab unkay aagay peechay payghumbar aaye kay tum Allah kay siwa kissi ki ibadat na kero to unhon ney jawab diya kay agar humara perwardigar chahata to farishton ko bhejta. Hum to tumhari risalat kay bilkul munkir hain

Abb aad ney to bey waja zamin mein sirkashi shooro kerdi aur kehney lagay kay hum say zor-aawar kon hai? Kiya unhen yeh nazar na aaya kay jiss ney unhen peda kiya hai woh unn say (boht hi) ziyadah zor-aawar hai woh (aakhir tak) humari aayaton ka inkar hi kertay rahey

Bil-aakhir hum ney unn per aik tez-o-tund aandhi manhoos dino mein bhej di kay unhen dunyawi zindagi mein zillat kay azab ka maza chakha den aur (yaqeen mano) kay aakhirat ka azab iss say boht ziyadah ruswaee wala hai aur woh madad nahi kiyey jayen gay
Rahey samood so hum ney unn ki bhi rehbari ki phir bhi unhon ney hidayat per andhay-pan ko tarjeeh di jiss bina per unhen (sarapa) zillat kay azab ki karak ney unn kay kartooton kay baees pakar liya
Aur (haan) eman daar aur paarsaaon ko hum ney (baal baal) bacha liya
Aur jiss din Allah kay dushman dozakh ki taraf laye jayen gay aur inn (sab) ko jama kerdiya jayega
Yahan tak kay jab bilkul jahannum kay pass aajayen gay unn per unn kay kaan aur unn ki aankhen aur unn ki khaalen unn kay aemaal ki gawahee den gay

Yeh apni khalon say kahen gay kay tum ney humaray khilaf shahdat kiyon di woh jawab den gi kay humen uss Allah ney qoot-e-goyaee ata farmaee jiss ney her cheez ko bolney ki taqat bakhshi hai ussi ney tumhen awwal martaba peda kiya aur ussi ki taraf tum sab lotaye jaogay

Aur tum (apni bad-aemaaliyan) iss waja say pocheedah rakhtay hi na thay kay tum per tumhari kaan aur tumhari aankhen aur tumhari khaalen gawahee den gi han tum yeh samjhtay rahey kay tum jo kuch bhi ker rahey ho iss mein say boht say aemaal say Allah bey-khabar hai
Tumhari issi bad-gumani ney jo tum ney apnay rab say ker rakhi thi tumhen halak ker diya aur bil-aakhir tum ziyan kaaron mein hogaye
Abb agar yeh sabar keren to bhi inn ka thikana jahannum hi hai. Aur agar yeh (uzar-o)-maafi kay khuastgaar hon to bhi (mazoor-o)-maaf nahi rakhay jayen gay

Aur hum ney inn kay kuch hum nashee muqarrar ker rakhay rhay jinhon ney unn kay aglay pichlay aemaal unn ki nighaon mein khoobsurat bana rakhay thay aur inn kay haq mein bhi Allah ka qol unn ummaton kay sath poora hua jo inn say pehlay jinno aur insano ki guzar chuki hain. Yaqeenan woh ziyan kaar sabir huyey
Aur kafiron ney kaha iss quran ko suno hi mat (iss kay parhay janey ka waqt) aur be-huda goee kero kiya ajab kay tum ghalib aajao
Pus yaqeenan hum inn kafiron ko sakht azab chakhayen gay. Aur enhen inn kay bad-tareen aemaal ka badla (zaroor) zaroor den gay
Allah kay dushmano ki saza yehi dozakh ki aag hai jiss mein inn ka hameshgi ka ghar hai (yeh) badla hai humari aayaton say inkar kerney ka

Aur kafir log kahen gay aey humaray rab! Humen jinno insano (kay woh dono fareeq) dikha jinhon ney humen gumrah kiya (takay) hum unehn apnay qadmon talay daal den takay woh jahannum mein sab say neechay (sakht azab mein) hojayen

(Waqaee) jinn logon ney kaha humara perwardigar Allah hai phir iss per waeem rahey unn kay pass farishtay (yeh kehtay huyey) aatay hain kay tum kuch bhi andesha aur ghum na kero (bulkay) iss jannat ki bisharat sunn lo jiss ka tum wada diyey gayey ho
Tumhari dunyawi zindagi mein bhi hum tumharay rafiq thay aur aakhirat mein bhi rahen gay jiss cheez ko tumhara ji chahye aur jo kuch tum mango sab tumharay liye (jannat mein mojood) hai
Ghafoor-o-Raheem (mabood) ki taraf say yeh sab kuch bator mehmani kay hai
Aur uss say ziyadah achi baat wala kon hai jo Allah ki taraf bulaye aur nek kaam keray aur kahey kay mein musalmanon mein say hun
Neki aur badi barabar nahi hoti. Buraee say bhalalee ko dafa kero phir wohi jiss kay aur tumharay darmiyan dushmani hai aisa hojayega jaisay dili dost
Aur yeh baat unhin ko naseeb hoti hai jo sabar keren aur issay siwaye baray naseebay walon kay koi nahi paa sakta
Aur aar shetan ki taraf say koi waswasa aaye to Allah ki panah talab kero. Yaqeenan woh boht hi sunnay wala jannay wala hai

Aur din raat aur sooraj chand bhi (ussi ki) nishaniyon mien say hain tum sooraj ko sajdah na kero na chand ko bulkay sajdah uss Allah kay liye kero jiss ney inn sab ko peda kiya hai agar tumhen ussi ki ibadat kerni hai to
Phir bhi agar yeh kibr-o-ghuroor keren to woh (farishtay) jo aap kay rab kay nazdeek hain woh to raat din uss ki tasbeeh biyan ker rahen hain aur (kissi waqt bhi) nahi uktatay

Uss Allah ki nishaniyon mein say (yeh bhi) hai kay tu zamin ko dabi dabaee dekhta hai phir jab hum iss per meenh barsatay hain to woh tar-o-taza hoker ubharney lagti hai. Jiss ney ussay zindah kiya wohi yaqeeni tor per murdon ko bhi zindah kerney wala hai be-shak woh her (her) cheez per qadir hai

Be-shak jo log humari aayaton mein kaj-rawi kertay hain woh (kuch) hum say makhfi nahi (batlao to) jo aag mein dala jaye woh acha hai ya woh jo aman-o-amaan kay sath qayamat kay din aaye? Tum jo chahao kertay chalay jao woh tumhara sab kiya keraya dekh raha hai
Jinn logon ney apnay pass quran phonch janey kay bawajood uss say kufur kiya (woh bhi hum say posheedah nahi) yeh bari ba-wuqaâ€™at kitab hai
Jiss kay pass baatil phatak bhi nahi sakta na uss kay aagay say na uss kay peechay say yeh hai nazil kerdah hikmaton walay khoobiyon walay (Allah) ki taraf say
Aap say wohi kaha jata hai jo aap say pehlay rasoolon say bhi kaha gaya hai yaqeenan aap ka rab maafi wala aur dard-naak azab wala hai

Aur agar hum issay ajami zaban ka quran banatay to kehtay kay iss ki aayaten saaf saaf biyan kiyon nahi ki gayen? Yeh kiya kay ajami kitab aur aap arabi rasool? Aap keh dijiyey! Kay yeh to eman walon kay liye hidayat-o-shifa hai aur jo eman nahi latay unn kay kaano mein to (behra-pan aur) bojh hai aur yeh unn per andha-pan hai yeh woh log hain jo kissi boht door daraz jagah say pukaray jarahey hain

Yaqeenan hum ney Musa (alh-e-salam) ko kitab di thi so uss mein bhi ikhtilaf kiya gaya aur agar (woh) baat na hoti (jo) aap kay rab ki taraf say pehlay hi muqarrar ho chuki hai to unkay darmiyan (kabhi ka) faisla ho chuka hota yeh log to iss kay baray mein boht sakht bey-shain kerney walay shak mein hain
Jo shaks nek kaam keray ga woh apnay nafay kay liye aur jo bura kaam keray ga uss ka wabal bhi ussi per hai. Aur aap ka rab bandon per zulm kerney wala nahi

Qayamat ka ilm Allah hi ki taraf lotaya jata hai aur jo jo phal apnay shagoofon mein say nikaltay hain aur jo madah hamal say hoti hai aur jo bachay woh janti (peda kerti) hai sab ka ilm ussay hai aur jiss din Allah Taalaa inn (mushrikon) ko bula ker daryaft farmaye ga meray shareek kahan hain woh jawab den gay kay hum ney to tujhay keh sunaya kay hum mein say to koi iss ka gawah nahi
Aur yeh jin (jin) ki parashtish iss say pehlay kertay thay woh inn ki nigah say gum hogaye aur enhon ney samjh liya kay abb inn kay liye koi bachao nahi
Bhalaee kay mangney say insan thakta nahi aur agar issay koi takleef phonch jaye to mayyus aur na umeed hojata hai

Aur jo museebat ussay phonch chuki hai iss kay baad agar hum issay kissi rehmat ka maza chakhayen to woh keh uthta hai kay iss ka to mein haqdaar hi tha aur mein to khayal hi nahi ker sakta kay qayamat qaeem hogi aur agar mein apnay rab kay pass wapis kiya gaya to bhi yaqeenan meray liye uss kay pass bhi behtri hai yaqeenan hum inn kuffaar ko unkay aemaal say khabardaar keren gay aur unhen sakht azab ka maza chakhayen gay
Aur jab hum insan per apna inam kertay hain to woh mun pher leta hai aur kinara kash hojata hai aur jab ussay museebat parti hai to bari lambi chori duyen kerney wala bann jata hai

Aap keh dijiyey! Kay bhala yeh to batao kay agar yeh quran Allah ki taraf say aaya hua ho phir tum ney issay na mana pus uss say barh ker behka hua kon hoga jo mukhalifat mein (haq say) door chala jaye

Un-qareeb hum enhen apni nishaniyan aafaq-e-aalam mein bhi dikhayen gay aur khud inn ki apni zaat mein bhi yahan tak kay inn per khul jaye kay haq yehi hai kiya aap kay rab ka her cheez say waqif-o-aagah hona kafi nahi
Yaqeen jano! Kay yeh log apnay rab kay roobaroo janey say shak mein hain yaad rakho kay Allah Taalaa her cheez ka ehaata kiyey huyey hai
Haa-meem
Ain â€“seen-qaaf
Allah Taalaa jo zabardast hai aur hikmat wala hai issi tarah teri taraf aur tujh say aglon ki taraf wahee bhejta raha
Aasmano ki (tamam) cheezen aur jo kuch zamin mein hai sab ussi ka hai woh bartar aur azeem-us-shan hai

Qareeb hai aasman uper say phat paren aur tamam farishtay apnay rab ki paki tareef kay sath biyan ker rahey hain aur zamin walon kay liye istaghfar ker rahey hain. Khoob samajh rakho kay Allah Taalaa hi maaf farmaney wala rehmat wala hai
Jinn logon ney uss kay siwa doosron ko kaar saaz bana liya hai Allah Taalaa unn per nigran hai aur aap unkay zimaydaar nahi hain

Issi tarah hum ney aap ki taraf arabi quran ki wahee ki hai takay aap makkah walon ko aur uss kay aas pass logon ko khabardar ker den aur jama honey kay din say jiss kay aanay mein koi shak nahi dara den. Aik giroh jannat mein hoga aur aik giroh jahannum mein hoga
Agar Allah Taalaa chahata to inn sab ko aik hi ummat ka bana deta lekin woh jissay chahata hai apni rehmat mein dakhil ker leta hai aur zalimon ka haami aur madadgar koi nahi
Kiya inn logon ney Allah kay siwa aur kaar saaz bana liye hain (haqeeqatan) to Allah Taalaa hi kaar saaz hai wohi murdon ko zindah keray ga aur wohi her cheez per qadir hai
Aur jiss jiss cheez mein tumhara ikhtilaf ho uss ka faisla Allah Taalaa hi ki taraf hai yehi Allah mera rab hai jiss per mein ney bharosa ker rakha hai aur jiss ki taraf mein jhukta hun

Woh aasmano aur zamin ka peda kerney wala hai uss ney tumhray liye tumhari jins kay joray bana diyey hain. Aur chopayon kay joray banaye hain tumhen woh iss mein phela raha hai uss jesi koi cheez nahi woh sunnay aur dekhney wala hai
Aasmano aur zamin ki kunjiyan ussi ki hain jiss ki chahye rozi kushada ker day aur tang ker day yaqeenan woh her cheez jannay wala hai

Allah Taalaa ney tumharay liye wohi deen muqarrar ker diya hai jiss kay qaeem kerney ka uss ney Nooh (alh-e-salam) ko hukum diya tha aur jo (ba-zariya wahee) hum ney teri taraf bhej di hai aur jiss ka takeedi hukum hum ney Ibrahim aur Musa aur Essa (alheem-us-salam) ko diya tha kay iss deen ko qaeem rakhna aur iss mein phoot na dalna jiss cheez ki taraf aap ehen bula rahey hain who to (inn) mushrikon per giran guzarti hai Allah Taalaa jissay chahata hai apna bargazeedah banata hai aur jo bhi uss ki taraf rujoo keray who uss ki sahih rehnumaee kerta hai

Unn logon ney apnay pass ilm aajaney kay baad hi ikhtilaf kiya (aur woh bhi) bahami zidd behas say aur agar aap kay rab ki baat aik waqt-e-muqarrara tak kay liye pehlay hi say qarar paagaee hui na hoti to yaqeenan unn ka faisla ho chuka hota aur jinn logon ko unn kay baad kitab di gaee hai woh bhi uss ki taraf say uljhan walay shak mein paray huye hain

Pus aap logon ko issi tarah bulatay rahen aur jo kuch aap say kaha gaya hai uss per mazbooti say jamm jayen aur inn ki khuwaishon per na chalen aur keh den kay Allah Taalaa ney jitni kitaben nazil farmaee hain mera unn per eman hai aur mujhay humkum diya gaya hai kay tum mein insaf kerta rahon. Humara aur tum sab ka perwerdigar Allah hi hai humaray aemaal humaray liye hain aur tumharay aemaal tumharay liye hain hum tum mein koi cut hujjati nahi Allah Taalaa hum (sab) ko jama keray ga aur ussi ki taraf lotna hai

Aur jo log Allah Taalaa ki baton mein jhagra daltay hain iss kay baad kay (makhlooq) ussay maan chuki unn ki cut hujjati Allah kay nazdeek batil hai aur unn per ghazab hai aur unn kay liye sakht azab hai
Allah Taalaa ney haq kay sath kitab nazil farmaee hai aur tarazoo bhi (utari hai) aur aap ko kiya khabar shayad qayamat qareeb hi ho

Iss ko jaldi unhen pari hai jo issay nahi mantay aur jo iss per yaqeen rakhtay hain woh to iss say darr rahey hain unhen iss kay haq honey ka poora ilm hai. Yad rakho jo log qayamat kay moamlay mein lar jhagar rahey hain woh door ki gumrahee mein paray huyey hain
Allah Taalaa apnay bandon per bara hi lutf kerney wala hai jissay chahata hai kushada rozi deta hai aur woh bari taqat baray ghalbay wala hai

Jiss ka iradah aakhirat ki kheti ka ho hum ussay uss ki kheti mein taraqqi den gay aur jo duniya ki kheti ki talab rakhta ho hum ussay uss mein say ho kuch dey den gay aisay shaks ka aakhirat mein koi hissa nahi

Kiya inn logon ney aisay (Allah kay) shareek (muqarrar ker rakhay) hain jinhon ney aisay ehkaam-e-deen muqarrar ker diyey hain jo Allah kay famaye huye nahi hain. Agar faislay kay din ka wada na hota to (abhi hi) inn mein faisla ker diya jata. Yaqeenan (inn) zalimon kay liye hi dard-naak azab hai

Aap dekhen gay kay yeh zalim apnay aemaal say darr rahey hongay jinn kay wabal inn per waqey honey walay hain aur jo log eman laye aur unhon ney nek aemaal kiyey woh bahishton kay baghaat mein hongay woh jo khuwaish keren apnay rab kay pass mojood payen gay yehi hai bara fazal

Yehi woh hai jiss ki bisharat Allah Taalaa apney bandon ko dey raha hai jo eman laye aur (sunnat kay mutabiq) nek aemaal kiyey to keh dijiyey! Kay mein iss per tum say koi badla nahi chahata magar mohabbat rishtaydaari ki jo shaks koi neki keray hum uss kay liye uss ki neki mein aur neki barha den gay be-shak Allah Taalaa boht bakhshney wala (aur) boht qadardaan hai

Kiya yeh kehtay hain kay (payghumber ney) Allah per khoot bandha hai agar Allah Taalaa chahye to aap kay dil per mohar laga day aur Allah Taalaa apni baton say jhoot ko mita deta hai aur sach ko sabit rakhta hai. Woh seenay ki baton ko jannay wala hai
Wohi hai jo apnay bandon ki toba qabool farmata hai aur gunahon say darguzar farmata hai aur jo kuch tum ker rahey ho (sab) janta hai
eman walon aur neko kaar logon ki sunta hai aur unhen apnay fazal say aur barha ker deta hai aur kuffaar kay liye sakht azab hai

Agar Allah Taalaa apnay (sab) bandon ki rozi faraakh ker deta to woh zamin mein fasad barpa ker detay lekin woh andazay kay sath jo kuch chahata hai nazil farmata hai woh apnay bandon say poora khabardar hai aur khoob dekhney wala hai
Aur wohi hai jo logon kay na-umeed hojaney kay bad barish barsata hai aur apni rehmat phela deta hai. Wohi hai kaar saaz aur qabil-e-hamd-o-sana
Aur uss ki nishaniyon mein say aasmano aur zamin ki pedaeesh hai aur inn mein jandaron ka phelana hai. Woh iss per bhi qadir hai kay jab chahye unhen jama ker day
Tumhen jo kuch museebaten phonchti hai woh tumharay apnay hathon kay kartoot ka badla hai aur woh to boht si baton say darguzar farma deta hai
Aur tum humen zamin mein aajiz kerney walay nahi ho tumharay liye siwaye Allah Taalaa kay na koi kaar saaz hai na madadgar
Aur darya mein chalney wali paharon jaisi kashtiyan uss ki nishaniyon mein say hain
Agar woh chahye to hawa band kerday aur yeh kashtiyan samnadaron per ruki reh jayen. Yaqeenan iss mein jer sabar kerney walay shukar guzar kay liye nishaniyan hain
Ya enhen inn kay kartootton kay baees tabah kerday woh to boht si khataon say darguzar farmaya kerta hai
Aur takay jo log humari nishaniyon mein jhagartay hain woh maloom kerlen kay unn kay liye chutkara nahi

To tumhen jo kuch diya gaya hai woh zindaganiy-e-duniya ka kuch yun hi sa asbab hai aur Allah kay pass jo hai woh iss say ba-darja behtar aur payedaar hai woh unn kay liye hai jo eman laye aur sirf apnay rab hi per bharosa rakhtay hain
Aur kabeerah gunahon say aur be-hayaeeon say bachtay hain aur gussay kay waqt (bhi) maaf ker detay hain
Aur apnay rab kay farman ko qabool kertay hain aur unn ka (her) kaam aapas kay mashwaray say hota hai aur jo hum ney unhen dey rakha hai uss mein say (humaray naam per) detay hain
Aur jab unn per zulm-(o-ziyadti) hoto woh sirf badla ley letay hain
Aur baraee ka badla ussi jaisi buraee hai aur jo maaf ker dayaur islah kerley uss ka ajar Allah kay zimay hai (fil-waqey) Allah Taalaa zalimon say mohabbat nahi kerta
Aur jo shaks apnay mazloom honay kay baad (barabar ka) badla ley ley to aisay logon per (ilzam ka) koi raasta nahi
Yeh raasta sirf unn logon per hai jo khud doosron per zulm keren aur zamin mein na haq fasad kertay phiren yehi log hain jinn kay liye dard-naak azab hai
Aur jo shaks sabar kerley aur maaf kerdey yaqeenan yeh bari himmat kay kaamon mein say (aik kaam) hai
Aur jissay Allah Taalaa behka dey uss ka iss kay baad koi chara saaz nahi aur tu dekhay ga kay zalim log azab ko dekh ker keh rahen hongay kay kiya wapis janey ki koi raah hai

Aur tu enhen dekhay ga kay woh (jahannum kay) samney la-kharay kiyey jayen gay maray zillat kay jhukay jarahen hongay aur kan-ankhiyon say dekh rahey hongay eman walay saaf kahen gay kay haqeeqi ziyan kaar woh hain jinhon ney aaj qayamat kay din apnay aap ko aur apnay ghar walon ko nuksan mein dal diya. Yaad rakho kay yaqeenan zalim log daaeemi azab mein hain
Unn kay koi madadgar nahi jo Allah Taalaa say alag unn ki madad ker saken aur jissay Allah gumrah kerdey uss kay liye koi raasta hi nahi
Apnay rab ka hukum maan lo iss say pehlay kay Allah ki janib say woh din aajaye jiss ka hut jana na-mumkin hai tumhen uss roz na koi panah ki jagah milay gi na chup ker anjan bann janey ki

Agar yeh mun pher len to hum ney aap ko inn per nigheybaan bana ker nahi bheja aap kay zimay to sirf paygham phoncha dena hai hum jab kabhi insan ko apni meharbani ka maza chakhatay hain to woh iss per itra jata hai aur agar unhen unn kay aemaal ki waja say koi museebat phonchti hai to be-shak insan bara hi na shukra hai
Aasmano ki aur zamin ki saltanat Allah Taalaa hi kay liye hai woh jo chahata hai peda kerta hai jiss ko chahata hai betyian deta hai aur jissay chahata hai betay deta hai
Ya enhen jama ker deta hai betay bhi aur betyian bhi aur jissay chahye baanjh ker deta hai woh baray ilm wala aur kamil qudrat wala hai

Na-mumkin hai kay kissi banday say Allah Taalaa kalam keray magar wahee kay zariyey ya parday kay peechay say ya kissi farishtay ko bhejay aur woh Allah ka hukum say jo woh chahaye wahee keray be-shak woh bartar hai hikmat wala hai

Aur iss tarah hum ney aap ki taraf apnay hukum say rooh ko utara hai aap iss say pehlay yeh bhi nahi jantay thay kay kitab aur eman kiya cheez hai? Lekin hum nay issay noor banaya iss kay zariyey say apnay bandon mein say jissay chahatay hain hidayat detay hain be-shak aap raah-e-raast ki rehnumaee ker rahey hain
Uss Allah ki raah ki jiss ki milkiyat mein aasmano aur zamin ki her cheez hai. Aagah raho sab kaam Allah Taalaa hi ki taraf lot-tay hain
Haa-meem
Qasam hai iss wazeh kitab ki
Hum ney iss ko arabi zaban ka quran banaya hai kay tum samjh lo
Yaqeenan yeh loh-e-mehfooz mein hai aur humaray nazdeek buland martba hikmat wali hai
Kiya hum iss naseehat ko tum say iss bina per hata len kay tum hadd say guzar janey walay ho
Aur hum ney aglay logon mein bhi kitney hi nabi bhejay
Jo nabi unn kay pass aaya unhon ney uss ka mazak uraya
Pus hum ney inn say ziyadah zor aawaron ko tabah ker dala aur aglon ki misal guzar chuki hai
Agar aap inn say daryaft keren kay aasmano aur zamin ko kiss ney peda kiya to yaqeenan inn ka jaeab yehi hoga kay unhen ghalib-o-dana (Allah) ney hi peda kiya hai
Wohi hai jiss ney tumharay liye zamin ko farash (bichona) banaya aur iss mein tumharay liye rastay ker diyey takay tum raah paa liya kero
Ussi ney aasman say aik andazay kay mutabiq pani nazil farmaya pus hum ney iss say murah shehar ko zindah ker diya.issi tarah tum nikalay jaogay
Jiss ney tamam cheezon kay joray banaye aur tumharay liye kashtiyan banaeen aur chopaye janwar (peda kiyey) jinn per tum sawar hotay ho

Takay tum inn ki peeth per jamm ker sawar hua kero phir apnay rab ki nemat ko yaad kero jab iss per theek thaak beth jaoaur kaho pak zaat hai uss ki jiss ney issay humaray bus mein ker diya halankay humen issay qaboo kerney ki taqat na thi
Aur bil-yaqeen hum apnay rab ki taraf lot ker janey walay hain
Aur enhon ney Allah kay baaz bando ko uss ka juzz thera diya yaqeenan insan khulla na-shukra hai
Kiya Allah Taalaa ney apni makhlooq mein say betiyan to khud rakh leen aur tumhen beton say nawaza
(Halankay) inn mein say kissi ko jab uss cheez ki khabar di jaye jiss ki misal uss ney (Allah) rehman kay liye biyan ki hai to uss ka chehra siyah parr jata hai aur woh ghumgeen hojata hai
Kiya (Allah ki aulad larkiyan hain) jo zewraat mein palen aur jhagray mein (apni baat) wazeh na ker saken

Aur enhon ney farishton ko jo rehman kay ibadat guzaar hain aurten qarar dey liya. Kiya unn ki pedaeesh kay moqay per yeh mojood thay? Inn ki yeh gawahee likh li jayegi aur inn say (iss cheez ki) baaz purs ki jayegi
Aur kehtay hain Allah chahta to hum inn ki ibadat na kertay. Enhen iss ki kuch khabar nahi yeh to sirf atkal pichoo (jhoot baaten) kehtay hain
Kiya hum ney enhen iss say pehlay koi (aur) kitab di hai jissay yeh mazboot thamay huyey hain
(nahi nahi) bulkay yeh to kehtay hain kay hum ney apnay baad dadon ko aik mazhab per paya aur hum inhi kay naqsh-e-qadam per chal ker raah yaafta hain

Issi tarah aap say pehlay bhi hum ney jiss basti mein koi daraney wala bheja wahan kay aasoodah haal logon ney yehi jawab diya kay hum ney apnay baap dada ko (aik raah per aur) aik deen per paya aur hum ney inhi kay naqsh-e-paa lo perwi kerney walay hain

(nabi ney) kaha bhi kay agar cheh mein tumharay pass uss say boht behtar (maqsood tak phonchaney wala) tareeqa ley ker aaya hun jiss per tum ney apnay baap dadon ko paya to unhon ney kaha hum iss kay munkir hain jissay day ker tumhen bheja gaya hai
Pus hum ney unn say intiqam liya aur dekh ley jhutlaney walon ka kaisa anjam hua
Aur jabkay ibrahim (alh-e-salam) ney apnay walid say aur apni qom say farmaya kay mein inn cheezon say beyzaar hun jinn ki tum ibadat kertay ho
Ba-juzz uss zaat kay jiss ney mujhay peda kiya hai aur wohi mujhay hidayat bhi keray ga
Aur ibrahim (alh-e-salam) issi ko apni aulad mein bhi baqi rehney wali baat qaeem ker gaye takay log (shirk say) baaz aatey rahen
Bulkay mein ney unn logon ko aur inn kay baap dadon ko saman (aur asbab) diya yahan tak kay unn kay pass haq aur saaf saaf sunaney wala rasool aagaya
Aur haq kay phonchtay hi yeh bol paray kay yeh to jadoo hai aur hum iss kay munkir hain
Aur kehney lagay yeh quran inn dono bastiyon mein say kissi baray aadmi per kiyon na nazil kiya gaya

Kiya aap kay rab ki rehmat ko yeh taqseem kertay hain? Hum ney hi inn ki zindagniy-e-duniya ki rozi inn mein taqseem ki hai aur aik ko doosray say buland kiya hai takay aik doosray ko matehat ker ley jissay yeh log samettay phirtay hain iss say aap kay rab ki rehmat boht hi behtar hai

Aur agar yeh baat na hoti kay tamam log aik hi tareeqay per hojayen gay to rehman kay sath kufur kerney walon kay gharon ki chatton ko hum chandi bana detay. Aur zeenon ko (bhi) jinn per charha kertay
Aur inn kay gharon kay darwazay aur takhat bhi jinn per woh takkiyey laga laga ker bethtay
Aur soney kay bhi aur yeh sabb kuch yunhi sa duniya ki zindagi ka faeedah hai aur aakhirat to aap kay rab kay nazdeek (sirf) perhezgaron kay liye (hi) hai
Aur jo shaks rehman ki yaad say ghaflat keray hum uss per aik shetan muqarrar ker detay hain wohi uss ka sathi rehta hai
Aur woh unhen raah say roktay hain aur yeh iss khayal mein rehtay hain kay yeh hidayat yafta hai
Yehan tak kay jabb woh humaray pass aayega kahega kash! Meray aur teray darmiyan mashriq aur maghrib ki doori hoti (to) bara bura sathi hai
Aur jabkay tum zalim thehar chukay to tumhen aaj hergiz tum sabb ka azab mein shareek hona koi nafa na dey ga
Kiya pus tu behray ko suna sakta hai ya andhay ko raah dikha sakta hai aur ussay jo khulli gumrahee mein ho
Pus agar hum tujhay yahan say bhi ley jayen to bhi hum inn say badla lenay walay hain
Ya jo kuch inn say wada kiya hai woh tujhay dikha den hum inn per bhi qudrat rakhtay hain
Pus jo wahee aap ki taraf ki gaee hai ussay mazboot thamay rahen be-shak aap rah-e-raast per hain
Aur yaqeenan yeh (khud) aap kay liye aur aap ki qom kay liye naseehat hai aur unqareeb tum log poochay jaogay
Aur humaray inn nabiyon say poocho! Jinhen hum ney aap say pehlay bheja tha kay kiya hum ney siwaye rehman kay aur mabood muqarrar kiyey thay jinn ki ibadat ki jaye
Aur hum ney musa (alh-e-salam) ko apni nishaniyan dey ker firaon aur usskay umraa kay pass bheja to (Musa alh-e-salam ney jaa ker) kaha kay mein tamam jahano kay rab ka rasool hun
Pus jab woh humari nishaniyan ley ker unn kay pass aaye to be-saakhta unn per hansney lagay
Aur hum unhen jo nishaniyan dikhatay thay woh doosray say barhi chahrhi hoti thi aur hum ney unhen azab mein pakra takay woh baaz aajayen
Aur unhon ney kaha aey jadoogar! Humaray liye apnay rab say uss ki dua ker jiss ka uss ney tujh say wada ker rakha hai yaqeen maan kay hum raah per lag jayen gay
Phir jab hum ney woh azab unn say hata liya unhon ney ussi waqt apna qol-o-qarar tor diya
Aur firaon ney apni qom mein munadi keraee aur kaha aey meri qom! Kiya misir ka mulk mera nahi? Aur meray (mehlon kay) neechay yeh nehren beh rahi hain kiya tum dekhtay nahi
Bulkay mein behtar hun ba-nisbat uss kay jo be-toqeer hai aur saaf bol bhi nahi sakta
Acha iss per soney kay kanggan kiyon nahi aa paray ya iss kay sath per bandh ker farishtay hi aajatay
Uss ney apni qom ko behlaya phuslaya aur unhon ney ussi ki maan li yaqeenan yeh saray hi nafarman log thay
Phir jab unhon ney humen gussa dilaya to hum ney unn say intiqam liya aur sab ko dubo diya
Pus hum ney unhen gaya guzra ker diya aur pichlon kay liye misal bana di
Aur jab ibn-e-mariyam ki misal biyan ki gaee to iss say teri qom (khushi say) cheekhney lagi hai
Aur enhon ney kaha kay humaray mabood achay hain ya woh? Tujh say inn ka yeh kehna mehaz jhagray ki gharaz say hai bulkay yeh log hain hi jhagraloo
Essa (alh-e-salam) bhi sirf banda hi hai jiss per hum ney ehsan kiya aur ussay bani-isareel kay liye nishan-e-qudrat banaya
Agar hum chahtay to tumharay ewaz farishtay kerdetay jo zamin mein ja nasheeni kertay
Aur yaqeenan essa (alh-e-salam) qayamat ki alamat hai pus tum qayamt kay baray mein shak na kero aur meri tabeydaari kero yehi seedhi raah hai
Aur shetan tumhen rok na day yaqeenan woh tumhara sareeh dushman hai

Aur jab essa (alh-e-salam) mojzzay laye to kaha kay mein tumharay pass hikmat laya hun aur iss liye aaya hun kay jinn baaz cheezon mein tum mukhtalif ho unhen wazeh kerdoon pus tum Allah Taalaa say daro aur mera kaha mano
Mera aur tumhara rab faqat Allah Taalaa hi hai. Pus tum sab uss ki ibadat kero. Rah-e-raast (yehi) hai
Phir (bani-israeel ki) jamaton ney aapas mein ikhtilaf kiya pus zalimon kay liye kharabi hai dukh walay din ki aafat say
Yeh log sirf qayamat kay muntazir hain kay woh achnak inn per aa paray aur enhen khabar bhi na ho
Uss din (gehray) dost bhi aik doosray kay dushman ban jayen gay siwaye perhezgaron kay
Meray bando! Aaj to tum per koi khof (o-hiras) hai aur na tum (bad-dil aur) ghumzadah hogay
Aur jo humari aayaton per eman laye aur thay bhi woh (farmabardar) musalman
Tum aur tumhari biwiyan hasshash basshash (razi khushi) jannat mein chalay jao

Inn kay charon taraf say soney ki rakabiyan aur soney kay gilason ka dor chalaya jaye ga inn kay ji jiss cheez ki khuwaish keren aur jiss say inn ki aankhen lazzat payen sab wahan hoga aur tum iss mein hamesha raho gay
Yehi woh bahisht hai kay tum apnay aemaal kay badlay iss kay waris banaye gaye ho
Yahan tumharay liye ba-kasrat meway hain jinhen tum khatay raho gay
Be-shak gunehgar log azab-e-dozakh mein hamesha rahen gay
Yeh azab kabhi bhi unsay halka na kiya jayega aur woh issi mein mayyus paray rahen gay
Aur hum ney inn per zulm nahi kiya bulkay yeh khud hi zalim thay
